songs.title: No Friends In Paradise
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Take your time
Take your time
Don't get anxious
Yeah
All this work that I put in
I'm losing patience
Yeah
I surround myself with energy and light
Yeah, yeah
On my own, No friends in my paradise
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise
Take your time
Take your time
Don't get anxious
Yeah
All this work that I put in
I'm losing patience
Yeah
I surround myself with energy and light
Yeah
On my own, No friends in my paradise

[Verse 1]
Sacrifice my time and money for my goals
Please don't call or text
I just turned off my phone
Please don't talk on matters you don't even know
Yeah
No don't talk down on my name
Boy watch your tone
Yeah
I can't fight you dog
I might mess up my Gucci
Yeah
I'm so bougie
I should star in my own movie
Yuh
Just because you know my name
Don't mean you know me
Yuh
I forget those all the time
I guess I'm clueless

[Chorus]
Take your time
Take your time
Don't get anxious
All this work that I put in
I'm losing patience
Yeah
I surround myself with energy and light
Yeah
On my own, No friends in my paradise
Yeah
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise
No friends in paradise

[Bridge]
Paradise
Para-Paradise
Yeah
Yeah

[Verse 2]
I dropped out of school
Used to be athletic
Yuh
I know bitches, niggas
Both want my aesthetic
I ain't got no time to talk to A&R's
I don't care who you are
But clearly I'm a star
They gon flex and fake inside they fancy cars
Yuh
Used to this LA life down on the boulevard
Yeah
Straight up living life
In a paradise
Straight up living life
In a paradise

[Outro]
Take your time
Take your time
Don't get anxious
